column4: hey, what's the "correct" way to edit what services (eg a webserver) are run automatically?
update-rc.d in hoary, nice new gui in breezy
ah, I knew I saw the nice gui somewhere. . . on my other system  :P
well I've found it useful in the past, nice to hear breezy will have something better and built in :(
yes, the documentation is progressing nicely
